name: Effigy (richardhsw)
description:
INTRODUCTION

When she was young, a fire accidentally broke out in the protagonist's home and killed her entire family.  Although her memories of the fire have been repressed,  there is a perpetual tinge of guilt in the protagonist's subconscious. 

CONTROLS

Movement - WASD

Sprint - SHIFT

Camera Look - Mouse

CREDITS

Designer: Richard Hsu
